title: Elementalist Lux.
body: So.. i wonder, will the new Ultimate Skin Elementalist Lux be reduced for like.. 900 Rp like Dj Sona was last year? would be pretty sweat.. I will buy elementalist lux but if she will be at a discount like dj sona would be awesome :) {{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

replies.body:
> Bringing all of our skins onto the same early sale schedule means there will no longer be a launch sale for 1350s and Ultimates starting in the new year.

http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales/were-changing-discounts
So.. you want to say elementalist lux will be 2450 rp at release?

> [{quoted}](name=UchÃ¬ha Sasuke,realm=EUNE,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=2i5J7biz,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-11-15T15:43:35.998+0000)
>
> So.. you want to say elementalist lux will be 2450 rp at release?

no 2450 is the sale price in 4-6 months after release, all Ultimate skins don't go on sale during release date
So.. we wont see any discount like last year on dj sona? {{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}
The DJ Sona Skin was 3250 at the release
DJ Sona was reduced by 25% for the first week of her release.
